message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm willing to part with it for $12,000.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer on it, but I need to stay within my budget. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.
